# 【10†Drake Launches Better World Fragrance House Candle Collection ...†www.apartmenttherapy.com】
Better World Fragrance House, the home fragrance line from rapper and singer Drake, is now on the market. After the highly-publicized limited release of Carby Musk (marketed as the scent of the rapper himself — Drake apparently smells like musk, ambers, cashmere, suede, and velvet, for those curious), the full collection has made its grand debut on Mother’s Day.

# 【12†Drake Adds Carby Musk to Better World Fragrance House†www.perfumerflavorist.com】
As previously reported, Drake's original relaunch of Better World Fragrance House in 2021 did not include Carby Musk. Related: Otherland Offering Mother’s Day Packaging for Candle Set. Carby Musk features a fragrance blend of velvet, musk, floral, amber and soft marine notes. Drake announced the launch of his fifth candle on his Instagram.
# 【13†Drake 'Better World Fragrance House' candle line: everything we know†www.capitalxtra.com】
The Canadian rapper, 34, has teamed up with perfumer Michael Carby to create his own line of scented candles, Better World Fragrance House. One of the candles is rumoured to smell like Drizzy himself.
# 【14†Drake Launches Fragrance Oil: "Carby Musk" | Hypebae†hypebae.com】
The rapper’s signature scent, dubbed “Carby Musk,” is a roll-on oil that’s said to embody a vibe of sophistication and refinement. The scent is a combination of lily of the valley, ambergris, oakmoss, skin musk and amber wood. It’s also the wearable version of the brand’s best-selling “Carby Musk” candle. The fragrance is unique ...

# 【18†When Is Drake Launching His Scented Candles? - The Cut†www.thecut.com】
Carby Musk: “Smooth musk fragrance is introspective as in an interpretation of your beautiful self, yet extrovertive as how you would want others to see your bold and brilliant self. Features notes of Musk, Ambers, Cashmere, Suede, and Velvet. Actually smells like Drake — it’s the personal fragrance he wears, which inspired BWFH.”
# 【19†Better World Fragrance House Luxury Scented Candle in Carby Musk - REVOLVE†www.revolve.com】

Fragranced Candle 

# Carby Musk

【8† Carby Musk 】 

10.5 oz / 297 g

Constructed unlike any other fragrance, Carby Musk is developed with an exclusive technology, made to linger in the air longer and leave a lasting impression. The layering of sweet, velvet powdery musks along with musks of soft floral, amber and marine connotations make it incredibly unique and a must have.

Each candle comes with a gold marker designed for personalization.

##  Product Details 

All candles are paraben free & phthalate free.  

##  Liner Notes 

Scent Profile: Amber Musk  

TOP: Floral  
MID: Amber  
DRY: Musk

##  How To Use 

• Trim the candle’s wick to ¼” before every burn  
• Allow the candle to burn for a minimum of 3-4 hours to prevent the wax from tunneling. This is especially important for the first burn.  
• Care instructions are provided on the bottom of each candle.

# Drake’s Scented Candle Collection Has Arrived

【141†Jessica Wang】

【141†Jessica Wang】

Jessica is a writer and former weekend editor at Apartment Therapy. Her work also appears in Bustle, Nylon, InStyle, Cosmopolitan, and more. She lives in Southern California with her dog.

Better World Fragrance House, the home fragrance line from 【145†rapper and singer Drake】, is now on the market. After the highly-publicized limited release of Carby Musk (marketed as the scent of the rapper himself — Drake apparently smells like musk, ambers, cashmere, suede, and velvet, for those curious), the full collection has made its grand debut on 【146†Mother’s Day】.

Available for $48 each, 【147†BWFH’s collection†www.betterworldfragrancehouse.co】 includes Carby Musk (
content.title: Drake Launches Better World Fragrance House Candle Collection | Apartment Therapy

parts:
The Carby Musk fragrance, part of Drake's Better World Fragrance House, has garnered attention for its unique scent profile and high-quality composition. Described as a luxurious blend, it features top notes of floral scents, mid notes of amber, and a dry down of musk. The fragrance is available both as a candle and a perfume oil.

Reviewers highlight its sophisticated and lingering aroma, which combines velvet, powdery musks with soft floral, amber, and marine undertones. This makes it a versatile and appealing scent that leaves a lasting impression【6†source】【8†source】【9†source】.

For more detailed reviews, you can check out video reviews on YouTube which offer personal experiences and impressions of the fragrance【6†source】【7†source】.
